cz.pb138.accounting.db

Interface AccountingDatabase


  • public interface AccountingDatabase
    Interface for manipulating with accounting records All records returned by database can either be editable - changes in record are reflected in database, stored after commit or dropped by rollback static - changes in record are independent of the database

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • colFound

        boolean colFound()
        Detects whether collection was found
        Returns:
        true if collection found, else false

      • isOwnerSet

        boolean isOwnerSet()
        Detecs whether Owner information is set within database
        Returns:
        true if owner is set, false otherwise

      • addRevenue

        Record addRevenue()
        Creates single revenue record
        Returns:
        Empty accounting record with preset issuing and billing date, editable record

        Creates single expenditure record
        Returns:
        Empty accounting record with preset issuing and billing date, editable record

      • getRecordsBetweenBilling

        java.util.List<Record> getRecordsBetweenBilling(java.lang.String after,
                                                java.lang.String before)
                                         throws cz.pb138.accounting.db.impl.AccountingException
        Find all records of revenue and expenditure in the given year based on billing date
        Parameters:
        after - lower bound date after which records exist, including the date
        before - upper bound date before which records exist, including the date
        Returns:
        list of Records, static records
        Throws:
        cz.pb138.accounting.db.impl.AccountingException - contains error code corresponding to error

      • commitChanges

        void commitChanges()
            throws cz.pb138.accounting.db.impl.AccountingException
        Commits changes (added revenues and expenditures). If conflict in database arises, may require rollback
        Throws:
        cz.pb138.accounting.db.impl.AccountingException - contains error code corresponding to error
